sage.scene.shape

Class Pyramid

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.TriMesh
          • sage.scene.shape.Pyramid

  • public class Pyramid
extends TriMesh
    This class defines a Pyramid which is a TriMesh made up of six colored triangles: four describing the triangular pyramid faces, and two describing the bottom. Each triangle (face) is a different color. The Pyramid assigns texture coordinates to each of the vertices, but does not use the Normal or other attributes of the parent TriMesh class.
